description: Test in-text annotation on `_num`/`_tem`/`_qty` type with denoted precision (`_PREC`) (#1335, en)

properties.name: Has area on prec4
properties.contents: [[Has type::Quantity]] [[Corresponds to::1 km²]] [[Corresponds to::0.38610 sq mi]] [[Corresponds to::1000 m²]] [[Display precision of::4]]

properties.name: Has area on prec2
properties.contents: [[Has type::Quantity]] [[Corresponds to::1 km²]] [[Corresponds to::0.38610 sq mi]] [[Corresponds to::1000 m²]] [[Display precision of::2]]

properties.name: Has area on prec0
properties.contents: [[Has type::Quantity]] [[Corresponds to::1 km²]] [[Corresponds to::0.38610 sq mi]] [[Corresponds to::1000 m²]] [[Display precision of::0]]

properties.name: Has currency on prec2
properties.contents: [[Has type::Quantity]] [[Display units::€, ¥]] [[Corresponds to:: € 1.00]] [[Corresponds to::¥,JPY,Japanese Yen 114.2121]] [[Display precision of::2]]

properties.name: Has currency on prec4
properties.contents: [[Has type::Quantity]] [[Display units::€, ¥]] [[Corresponds to:: € 1.00]] [[Corresponds to::¥,JPY,Japanese Yen 114.2121]] [[Display precision of::4]]

subjects.name: Example/P0410/1
subjects.contents: [[Has temperature on prec4::32 °F]] [[Has temperature on prec4::100 °C]]

subjects.name: Example/P0410/2
subjects.contents: [[Has temperature on prec2::32 °F]] [[Has temperature on prec2::100 °C]]

subjects.name: Example/P0410/1/1
subjects.contents: {{#ask: [[Has temperature on prec4::32 °F]] |?Has temperature on prec4 |format=table }}

subjects.name: Example/P0410/2/1
subjects.contents: {{#ask: [[Has temperature on prec2::32 °F]] |?Has temperature on prec2 |format=table }}

subjects.name: Example/P0410/3/1
subjects.contents: [[Has number on prec4::.001]] [[Has number on prec2::.001]] [[Has number::.003]]

subjects.name: Example/P0410/3/2
subjects.contents: [[Has number on prec4::.005]] [[Has number on prec2::.005]] [[Has number::.008]]

subjects.name: Example/P0410/3
subjects.contents: {{#ask: [[~Example/P0410/3/*]] |?Has number on prec4 |?Has number on prec2 |?Has number |format=table }}

subjects.name: Example/P0410/4/1
subjects.contents: [[Has area on prec2::10,000 m²]] [[Has area on prec4::0.02 km²]] [[Has area on prec0::3.33 km²]]

subjects.name: Example/P0410/4
subjects.contents: {{#ask: [[~Example/P0410/4/*]] |?Has area on prec4 |?Has area on prec2 |?Has area on prec0 |format=table }}

subjects.name: Example/P0410/5/1
subjects.contents: [[Has currency on prec2::€ 5]] [[Has currency on prec4::¥ 100]]

subjects.name: Example/P0410/5/2
subjects.contents: [[Has currency on prec2::€ 5,000]] [[Has currency on prec4::¥ 0.50]]

subjects.name: Example/P0410/5
subjects.contents: {{#ask: [[~Example/P0410/5/*]] |?Has currency on prec4 |?Has currency on prec2 |format=table }}

parser-testcases.about: #4 Prec2 vs Prec4 incl. rounding on output for plain number
parser-testcases.subject: Example/P0410/3

parser-testcases.about: #5 Prec2 vs Prec4 vs Prc0 quantity output
